snippet

post

button system

HTML Structure
<a href="#" class="btn"><span class="btn-text">name</span></a>
<button type="button" class="btn"><span class="btn-text">name</span></button>
<button type="submit" class="btn"><span class="btn-text">name</span></button>
Class Options
module module-*
style style-*
type type-*
outline xx-small, x-small, small, medium, large, x-large, xx-large, xx-large
accent normal-*, accent-*
symbols symbol-ltr-*, symbol-rtl-*
options disabled
style
<a href="#" class="btn module-b style-a"><span class="btn-text">Button Text</span></a>
<a href="#" class="btn module-b style-b"><span class="btn-text">Button Text</span></a>
<a href="#" class="btn module-b style-c"><span class="btn-text">Button Text</span></a>
